question:
Rudi is a junior high school student. He goes to SMP 13    everyday. He goes to school on foot (jalan kaki).
Rudi likes playing gootball and basket ball every week.
He never comes late to scholl. He always respects
(menghormati) and obeys (mematuhi) his parents and
teachers.
29. Who is Rudi?
a. A student
b. A teacher
c. A player
d. A football player

30. Where is he studying? 
a. SMP 12 c. SMP 14
b. SMP 13 d. A football player

31. How does he go to school?
a. By bisycle c. By bus
b. By car d. on foot 

32. Does he like basketball? 
a. Yes, he don't c. Yes, he does
b. Yes, he liket d. Yes, he did
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

29. a. A student

30. b. SMP 3

31. d. On foot

32. c. Yes, he does

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu..

Jawaban:

29. A. A Student

30. B. SMP 13

31. D. On Foot

32. C. Yes, He Does

related_questions.question:
1.    Complete the dialog by correcting the words in the brackets.
Diyan : (1/ want/go/ Daly city)
(the bus/ go / Daly city)?
Hayu : No, it doesn't.
Diyan : Where does it go?
Hayu : (it/go/ downtown).
Diyan: How do I get to Daly City?
Hayu
(cross / the street) and (wait / the next Number 14).
Source: http://squirrelspace.blogspot.co.id
2.
a.
Choose the correct time expression used with the present continuous tense.
What are you doing (tomorrow / yesterday) afternoon?
b. (Currently / Current) we're working on the Anderson account.
What are you doing (this/next) afternoon?
d. Thomas is presenting at the meeting (on / in) April.
Change the word in the brackets into past tense form.
C.
3.
1 (wake) up around 8:30 a.m. in the morning yesterday. When I (look) at the
clock 1 (say), "Oh, I'm getting late for the Yoga class and my teacher is going to
punish me for this." It (be not) the first time for me to be late for the class.

TOLONG DIBANTU YA KAK NO 1.2.3​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Dyan : I want to go to Daly city.

Does the bus go to Daly city?

Hayu : No, It doesn't.

Dyan : Where does it go?

Hayu : It goes downtown.

Dyan : How do i get to Daly city?

Hayu : Go cross the street and wait the next bus number 14.

2. a. Tomorrow

b. Currently

c. This

d. In

3. woke,looked,said,was not,

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

related_questions.question: Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a....daydesi:yes. lets play outdoor

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a sunny day

Desi: yes. lets play outdoor!

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan merupakan kata sifat (Adjective) yaitu sunny yang berarti cerah dan berfungsi untuk menjelaskan kata benda (Noun) day. Karena hari cerah, maka Desi mengajak untuk bermain di luar.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Mrs. Retno is my Biology techer. She is good techer.    She likes teching very much. Mrs. Terno is rather tall
(tinggi). She is abourt 165 cm. Her skin (kulitnya) is light
and she has wavy hair (keriting). Mr. Heru is a Math teacher.
he is fat (gemuk) and short. His skin is dark brown. He looks
very fierce (galak) but actually be is very good teacher, most
of the students like him.
a.
24. How many people are there in the text?
a. 2
b. 3
c. 4
d. 1
25. Does mrs. Retno have a light or black skin?
a. Yes, she does
c. Light skin
b. No, she doesn't d. Black skin
26. Who teaches (mengajar) Math?
Mr. Heru does
c. Mrs. Retno does
b. The writer does
d. The reader does
27. Who teaches Biology ?
a. The reader does c. Mrs. Retno does
b. Mr. Heru does
d. The writer does
28. Today is Sunday. The day after tomorrow is ....
a. Monday
c. Wednesday
b. Tuesday
d. Saturday​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

24. A. 2

25. C. light skin

26. A. Mr. Heru does

27. C. Mrs. Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

semoga terbantu, maap kalo salah. Kalo bener jangan lupa jadiin jawaban tercerdas yak✌

24. B.3

25. B.She doesn't

26. A.Mr Heru does

27. C. Mrs Retno does

28. B. Tuesday

Penjelasan:

25. The one with the light skin is Mrs. Terno

26. Mr Heru is a math teacher

27. The biology teacher ia Mrs. Retno

28. Today : Sunday

Tommorow : Monday

After tommorow : Tuesday
